name: Realm Rush (Udemy Course Porject)
description:
Controls: 

Use your mouse to place towers, You only have 5 towers, they will move if you try to place more, 25 points to win!

This is just a super simple tower defense. 

You'll have to close the browser tab to end the game.

I made this following a Udemy course from https://www.gamedev.tv/. 

Not meant to be anything serious, just a learning experience for myself.

Theme was made using FL Studio and Serum presets. All sound effects are royalty free samples.

If you want the "full" experience, go ahead and download the game instead of playing in the browser ^_^
